div.p: [...] and he has appointed [...] of the wickedness, whispering and [...] I have written to Petechonsis that he should come [so that] he can make [...] of the canal [...] surety for them, on condition that he shall dig the [...] works at the landing stage [...] four. Concerning the lipourgion [...] Translation with slight modifications: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 94, Â© Peeters
